HANDLE WITH CARE

Feature Film

Synopsis: In the wake of a short-lived marriage, a young man sells his unused wedding gifts online and learns valuable life lessons from the people he meets along the way.

Written & Directed By: MJT

Cast: Justin Min, Nicole Brydon Bloom, Jon Rudnitsky, Michael Cyril Creighton, Peter Jacobsen, Elizabeth Paige, Peter Gerety, Amir Arison, Catherin Curtin, Melanie Chandra, Tony Macht, Winslow Bright, Gina Brillon, Ethel Fisher, Michael Everette Johnson, Roger Wayne

Producers: Barret Hacia, Ashim Ahuja, Noah Williams, Evan Dinger

Executive Producer: John O'Rourke

Cinematographer: Justin Henning

Premiere: Festival Circuit 2026

Casting: SJ Allocco

1st AD: Emily Sarane

2nd AD: Nicky Carne

Production Designer: Emma Cantor

Gaffer: Clemence Therin

Key Grip: Jake Sofaer

Costume Designer: Ava Hama
